generated_doNotEdit.title: Get Equipped Item Name Query
generated_doNotEdit.description: DEPRECATED (Use query.is_item_name_any instead if possible so names can be changed later without breaking content.) Takes one optional hand slot as a parameter (0 or 'main_hand' for main hand, 1 or 'off_hand' for off hand), and a second parameter (0=default) if you would like the equipped item or any non-zero number for the currently rendered item, and returns the name of the item in the requested slot (defaulting to the main hand if no parameter is supplied) if there is one, otherwise returns ''.
